short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for Twitter by Infomon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Infomon revolves around AI-powered digital pets, offering gamified experiences like Infomon capturing, traveling, farming, and crafting. 

Initially focused on delivering a 10x content discovery experience, gradually extending itself towards an app, a platform-agnostic companion and ultimately a comprehensive platform, to enrich social interaction, content creation, and asset transactions. 

Infomon will soon be your one-stop platform for all things crypto!

Important Notes:

1.Infomon leverages DOM blocking functionality and the DOM Blocker to ensure secure interactions with AI components and wallet extensions, such as Ronin Wallet.
2. Infomonâ€™s AI components are designed to help users generate positive, constructive comments, fostering a friendly and supportive community.
3. For optimal Web3 interaction, Infomon requires the Ronin Wallet extension to function properly. Please ensure compatibility with Ronin Wallet to fully enjoy the platform's features.
